Req Name: [TRQ2354] The analysis software shall allow a user to view all runs in a table.
Req Description: The analysis software shall allow a user to view all runs in a table.

Req Name: [TRQ2355] When viewing all runs, the analysis software shall display a table populated with runs, with the column headers:
Req Description:
When viewing all runs, the analysis software shall display a table populated with runs, with the column headers:
- Run Name
- Status
- Last Modified
- User ID
- Flow Cell ID

Req Name: [TRQ2638] The analysis software shall perform external backups of working databases and audit trail.
Req Description: The analysis software shall perform external backups of working databases and audit trail.

Req Name: [TRQ2635] The analysis software shall read input data and write output data over NFSv3.
Req Description: The analysis software shall read input data and write output data over NFSv3.

Req Name: [TRQ2636] The analysis software shall be accessible over HTTPS.
Req Description: The analysis software shall be accessible over HTTPS.

Req Name: [TRQ2631] The analysis software shall allow a user to view the following software versioning information:
Req Description:
The analysis software shall allow a user to view the following software versioning information:
- Version of GMS
- Version of ctDNA Analysis Pipeline
- Versions of annotation databases
- Version of GMS Admin UI

Req Name: [TRQ2630] After login, the analysis software shall display the home screen.
Req Description: After login, the analysis software shall display the home screen.

Req Name: [TRQ2633] The analysis software shall allow sending a notification email with the following information:
Req Description:
The analysis software shall allow sending a notification email with the following information:
- Analysis status
- Name

Req Name: [TRQ1960] The software shall to detect fusions in the following assay panels:
Req Description:
The software shall to detect fusions in the following assay panels:
- AVENIO ctDNA Targeted Kit
- AVENIO ctDNA Expanded Kit
- AVENIO ctDNA Surveillance Kit

Req Name: [TRQ2348] The analysis software shall display the following information for Runs in the completed state:
Req Description:
The analysis software shall display the following information for Runs in the completed state:
- Run Name
- Number of samples successfully analyzed
- Number of samples which failed analysis
- Message if the run was cancelled

Req Name: [TRQ1962] The analysis software shall complete analysis of up to 800 million paired end reads within 24 hours.
Req Description: The analysis software shall complete analysis of up to 800 million paired end reads within 24 hours.

Req Name: [TRQ1963] The analysis software shall execute using GMS as the software platform.
Req Description: The analysis software shall execute using GMS as the software platform.

Req Name: [TRQ2037] The analysis software shall to analyze data sets in which multiple panel assays were performed.
Req Description: The analysis software shall to analyze data sets in which multiple panel assays were performed.

Req Name: [TRQ2036] The analysis software annotation databases shall be able to be updated manually.
Req Description: The analysis software annotation databases shall be able to be updated manually.

Req Name: [TRQ2035] The analysis software annotation databases shall be able to be updated without affecting analysis software performance or installation
Req Description: The analysis software annotation databases shall be able to be updated without affecting analysis software performance or installation

Req Name: [TRQ2034] The analysis software shall allow 2 or more filters to be applied simultaneously
Req Description: The analysis software shall allow 2 or more filters to be applied simultaneously

Req Name: [TRQ2033] The fusion results table shall be sortable alphanumerically in ascending or descending order for the following columns:
Req Description:
The fusion results table shall be sortable alphanumerically in ascending or descending order for the following columns:
- Partner Gene 1
- Breakpoint 1
- Partner Gene 2
- Breakpoint 2
- Paired Reads Spanning BP (BreakPoint)

Req Name: [TRQ2032] The analysis software shall produce a Quality Control Report with the following Run Metrics:
Req Description:
The analysis software shall produce a Quality Control Report with the following Run Metrics:
- Clusters Passing Filter
- Reads passing filter
- Aligned to PhiX
- Reads
- Percent Bases with Q >= 30

Req Name: [TRQ2031] The analysis software shall produce reports which contain the disclaimer For Research Use Only. Not for use in diagnostic procedures.
Req Description: The analysis software shall produce reports which contain the disclaimer "For Research Use Only. Not for use in diagnostic procedures."

Req Name: [TRQ2030] The CNV Amplifications results table shall be sortable alphanumerically in ascending or descending order for the following columns:
Req Description:
The CNV Amplifications results table shall be sortable alphanumerically in ascending or descending order for the following columns:
- Gene
- Segment Range

Req Name: [TRQ2378] When a sample fails to analyze, the analysis software shall provide a reason for failure of that sample.
Req Description: When a samples fails to analyze, the analysis software shall provide a reason for failure of that sample.

Req Name: [TRQ2039] When a QC checkpoint fails, the analysis software shall notify the user of the error with an error message associated with the error trigger.
Req Description: When an error occurs during analysis, the analysis software shall notify the user of the error with an error message associated with the error trigger.

Req Name: [TRQ2038] The analysis software global navigation bar shall allow a user to navigate to the home screen.
Req Description: The analysis software global navigation bar shall allow a user to navigate to the home screen.

Req Name: [TRQ2642] The analysis software shall allow a user to view license information about annotation sources.
Req Description: The analysis software shall allow a user to view license information about annotation sources.

Req Name: [TRQ2646] The analysis software shall allow a user to Duplicate and Rerun an existing analysis run.
Req Description: The analysis software shall allow a user to Duplicate and Rerun an existing analysis run.

Req Name: [TRQ2679] The analysis software shall allow a user to filter by variants which are rare in Germline genomes.
Req Description: The analysis software shall allow a user to filter by variants which are rare in Germline genomes.

Req Name: [TRQ2375] The analysis software shall allow the user to select the directory of BCL files to analyze.
Req Description: The analysis software shall allow the user to select the directory of BCL files to analyze.

Req Name: [TRQ3358] When the user views run details, the analysis software shall display the following run information:
Req Description:
When the user views run details, the analysis software shall display the following run information:
- Run Name
- Run ID
- Elapsed time since analysis has begun
- Operator
- Software Version used for analysis
- Number of samples in run
- Sequence data path where BCL or FASTQ files are stored
- Flowcell ID (blank if not provided)
- Sequencer Name (blank if not provided)
- Date when sequencer was started (blank if not provided)

Req Name: [TRQ1979] The analysis software shall calculate mutant molecules per milliliter for SNVs in the following assay panels:
Req Description:
The analysis software shall calculate mutant molecules per milliliter for SNVs in the following assay panels:
- AVENIO ctDNA Targeted Kit
- AVENIO ctDNA Expanded Kit
- AVENIO ctDNA Surveillance Kit

Req Name: [TRQ1978] The analysis software shall calculate allele frequency of SNVs in the following assay panels:
Req Description:
The analysis software shall calculate allele frequency of SNVs in the following assay panels:
- AVENIO ctDNA Targeted Kit
- AVENIO ctDNA Expanded Kit
- AVENIO ctDNA Surveillance Kit

Req Name: [TRQ1977] The analysis software shall produce a Quality Control Report with the following run information:
Req Description:
The analysis software shall produce a Quality Control Report with the following run information:
- Sample Name
- Run Name
- Run ID
- Date Run was Started
- Panel of Sample

Req Name: [TRQ1976] The analysis software shall allow a user to apply published workflows to a sample.
Req Description: The analysis software shall allow a user to apply published workflows to a sample.

Req Name: [TRQ1973] The analysis software shall place output files in the following standard directory structure:  Run name / samples / sample name /
Req Description: The analysis software shall place output files in the following standard directory structure: "Run name / samples / sample name /"

Req Name: [TRQ2003] The analysis software shall generate Quality Control Reports as a PDF file.
Req Description: The analysis software shall generate Quality Control Reports as a PDF file.

Req Name: [TRQ2000] The analysis software shall allow the user to export VCF data as a JSON file.
Req Description: The analysis software shall allow the user to export VCF data as a JSON file.

Req Name: [TRQ2001] The analysis software shall produce a Quality Control Report with a graph of the Coverage Uniformity for a sample.
Req Description: The analysis software shall produce a Quality Control Report with a graph of the Coverage Uniformity for a sample.

Req Name: [TRQ2006] The summary data for SNVs in reports shall contain the following information:
Req Description:
The summary data for SNVs in reports shall contain the following information:
- Gene
- Alteration
- Allele Fraction
- Mutant Molecules per ml.

Req Name: [TRQ2007] The summary data for Indels in reports shall contain the following information:
Req Description:
The summary data for Indels in reports shall contain the following information:
- Gene
- Alteration
- Allele Fraction
- Mutant Molecules per ml.

Req Name: [TRQ2004] The analysis software shall allow the user to export an aberration report as a PDF file.
Req Description: The analysis software shall allow the user to export an aberration report as a PDF file.

Req Name: [TRQ2008] The summary data for CNV Amplifications in reports shall contain the following information:
Req Description:
The summary data for CNV Amplifications in reports shall contain the following information:
